org.crosswire.common.diff
类 Commonality

java.lang.Object
  org.crosswire.common.diff.Commonality

public class Commonality
extends java.lang.Object

A Commonality is shared text at the beginning, middle or end of two strings. Based on the LGPL Diff_Match_Patch v1.5 javascript of Neil Fraser, Copyright (C) 2006
http://neil. fraser.name/software/diff_match_patch/

作者：
DM Smith [dmsmith555 at yahoo dot com]
另请参见：
for license details.
The copyright to this program is held by it's authors.

方法摘要
static CommonMiddle halfMatch(java.lang.String source, java.lang.String target)
          Do the two texts share a substring which is at least half the length of the longer text?
static int prefix(java.lang.String source, java.lang.String target)
          Find the length of a common prefix.
static int suffix(java.lang.String source, java.lang.String target)
          Find the length of a common suffix.
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

方法详细信息

prefix

public static int prefix(java.lang.String source,
                         java.lang.String target)
Find the length of a common prefix.

参数：
source - First string
target - Second string
返回：
The number of characters common to the start of each string.

suffix

public static int suffix(java.lang.String source,
                         java.lang.String target)
Find the length of a common suffix.

参数：
source - First string
target - Second string
返回：
The number of characters common to the end of each string.

halfMatch

public static CommonMiddle halfMatch(java.lang.String source,
                                     java.lang.String target)
Do the two texts share a substring which is at least half the length of the longer text?

参数：
source - Baseline string
target - Changed string
返回：
a CommonMiddle Or null if there was no match.
